page.title: 13Story of the valley. page 2
page.content: There is also a field named{Acer-Ddu (black acre) in which the soldiers who fought a great battle at{Cae-Llewelyn (field of Llewelyn) are buried. There is a hill called{Rhiw-Goch}(redhill). It was supposed to have turned red with the soldiers blood.There is also {Rhyd-Goch}(red ford) which is also supposed to have turned red with blood. One day Llewelyn took his two sons to the top of the mountain and said to one{"Dyma Cwm-Tydi"}which means here is your valley, and he said to his other son{"Dacw Cwm o" (Cymmo) which means 'here is his valley'. These are the names given to the farms.
